title: Why do I need to paraphrase my essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to compose your own original academic work while using vast quantities of source material, you need to be very careful not to copy someone else’s work. You need to paraphrase others work that you are using as a rule, and even your own essay, to make it unique and maybe to highlight other idea.  It can be really hard work for most students, because it’s not about to switch the words or find synonyms. There are a lot of online tools that can paraphrase some content, but I don’t recommend you to use it, because there is no guarantees that you end up with exactly the kind of text you need. They use just simple machine algorithm that can’t recognize the main theme or the goal of your paraphrasing.
